column5: My place is great for couples, business travelers and extended stays. It accommodates 2 people comfortably and up to 4 people total (1 Bed/1 Sleeper Sofa). Located minutes from Will Rogers Memorial Center (1.4 miles) and the Cultural District. Within five miles of Sundance Square at Downtown Fort Worth, TCU and Amon G. Carter Stadium, and the Historic Fort Worth Stockyards.
